m.marble-sense: אמץ:002001001060:Strong:to strengthen;to support;to repair;to let grow strong
אמר:002004001009008:Speak:to say;to speak;to tell;to command;to think;to call
חזק:002001001060:Strong>002001002003:Confident:to be strong (mentally);to be courageous;to stand firm;to be resolute
ירא:002001002001:Afraid:to be afraid;to fear;to be in awe of;to revere
עלה:002002001009:Move:to go up;to climb up;to mount
